transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Hello? Haan boliye.
Haan boliye.
Mai Vaishnavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Vishnu sir thoda bahar gaye hue hai, aane ke baad karwate hai na.
Achha Vishnu sir hai nahi?
Vishnu sir thoda bahar gaye hue hai, abhi aa jayenge 15-20 minute se.
Achha achha, aapko iske bare mein pata hoga kya, inhone Vishnu sir ne abhi do din pehle IndiaMART pe phone number change karane ka request diya.
Han han wo aayenge na tabhi aapse baat karwate hai hum.
Achha, kya wohi jante hai toh.
Han han.
Thik hai thik hai toh, mai 15-20 minute mein aapko phone karwati hu.
Thik hai thik hai, isi number pe aap call kar dijiye.
Han han isi isi number pe, thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to speak with Vishnu regarding request.

- Customer states Vishnu is currently out of office.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back in 15-20 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 15-20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- phone number change, indiaMART, call back
